column5: I'd like to continue to fish Simcoe for perch after tomorrow, but I'm not sure how long I'd want to keep fishing the  main lake due to moving ice/cracks etc, and generally unsafe ice.  Is there a noticable difference in ice quality and safety in cooks bay as opposed to the main lake?  Of course I would be walking. Thanks.
There's still a good 12-16 inches of ice, watch out for old hut holes.
...But does it stay good for longer than the main lake? Thanks.
yes it does i was out there today and it was real good but the shore line is crap in gilford
